mapper.insert: insert into member_table(memberEmail, memberPassword, memberName, memberAge) values (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge})
mapper.select: Select * from member_table where memberEmail=#{memberEmail} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
mapper.update: update member_table set memberName = #{memberName} , memberAge = #{memberAge} where id = #{id}
